title: The Wiggles: Yummmy yummy. Wiggle time
creator_credit: Chisholm McTavish, Nick Pike, Wiggles Touring Pty Ltd and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Let the four coloured Wiggles entertain your pre-school child with simple songs that they can sing and dance along to. The Wiggles are presented here in a in a studio setting with simple sets and colourful costumes suitable for the very young. Jeff, Murray, Anthony and Greg are also joined by Wags the Dog, Henry, Dorothy the Dinosaur and Captain Feathersword. “Yummy Yummy” includes such songs as “Hot Potato”, “Walk”, and “Fruit Salad” with a total of fourteen to choose from. “Wiggle Time” songs include “Get Ready to Wiggle”, “Captain Feathersword” and “Rock-A-Bye Your Bear” amongst ten other titles.
creator_credit_for_label: Chisholm McTavish, Nick Pike, Wiggles Touring Pty Ltd and ABC-TV (Australia)
